title: Please help me save and rescue an old street dog with a big wound near my house!
selftext:
Hi, r/india! 

Oldie, an old homeless dog that I feed near my house, has developed a big gaping wound on her back.

I am raising 7000 rupees to rescue her. This includes costs for an ambulance, boarding shelter, medicines, doctor fees, treatment costs, etc. 

I also feed 70+ dogs around my house, and you can check my work on Instagram handle "@aashadeepanimalstrust". 

So, please come forward to help me raise the money to fund her treatment. 

Donation details: 

Name: Aashadeep Animals Trust

Bank Name: Bank of India 

A/C No: 602120110000815 

IFSC Code: BKID0006021 

A/C Type: Current

Paytm/PhonePe/GPay: 9899000197

​

​

https://preview.redd.it/7yzvvvkihnob1.png?width=438&format=png&auto=webp&s=975dfa4566805aeedef084738248cd9eb2d54172

​

Please don't ignore this. Thank you so much! <3 

​

​

i also dm'd you. please check.
